prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small ancient creature with a spiraled shell.
I want a playful aquatic Pokemon with a unique spiral shell and vibrant blue features.
Generate a fossil-inspired Pokemon design that showcases a blend of sea and land elements.
Make a cute and ancient Pokemon with a round body and prominent blue tentacles.
Imagine a small, prehistoric Pokemon with a shell, swimming gracefully in the ocean.
Design a quirky Pokemon that combines elements of water and rock types with a spiral shape.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like an ancient mollusk, featuring a shell and aquatic colors.
